## Yahtzee Game from Lab

For this problem, if you get all the same values you get a "yahtzee"

```{r}
sample(1:6, 5, replace = T)
```

```{r}
num_trials = 10000
yahtzee <- 0

#for (i in 1:num_trials) {
#for(i in 1:num_trials) {

for(i in 1:num_trials) {
  dice_rolls <- sample(1:6, 5, replace = T)
  if (sd(dice_rolls) == 0) {
    print(dice_rolls)
    yahtzee <- yahtzee + 1
  }
}
#}
paste0("The frequency of getting a yahtzee is: ", yahtzee/num_trials)
paste0("the margin of error is ", 1/sqrt(num_trials) * 100,"%")
```
